actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-387.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the National Preservation Act of 1966 to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund and the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to extend through FY 2005 the authorization of appropriations for: (1) the Historic Preservation Fund; and (2) activities of the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Preservation Act of 1966 to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund and the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation, and for other purposes.
